entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Falls
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
